exp_datetime.description: Date and time at which the experiment was started.

experimenter.description: Name of the person who is running the experiment.

protocol.description: Name of an XML file that has values for experiment parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever an experiment protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name

id.description: Apparatus identifier, generated from rig, plate, bowl

line.description: Verified as legal line name in SAGE. New line names may be added to SAGE using the web interface.

effector.description: Verified as legal effector name in SAGE.

gender.description: The gender or genders of the flies. m=male, f=female, b=both, x=unknown

cross_date.description: Date cross was made to generate this set of flies.

hours_starved.description: Number of hours flies were starved prior to start of experiment.

count.description: Number of flies actually put into apparatus for this experiment; may be different from protocol number of flies intended for the experiment.

content.description: Genotype of flies. Typically auto-generated from line and effector.

protocol.description: Name of an XML file that has values for rearing parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever a rearing protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name .

incubator.description: ID number for incubator flies were raised in.

protocol.description: Name of an XML file that has values for pre-assay handling parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever a handling protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name .

handler_sorting.description: Name of the person who sorted the flies.

handler_starvation.description: Name of the person who moved the flies to starvation material.

hours_sorted.description: Time in hours between sorting and experiment start.

datetime_sorting.description: Date and time at which the flies were sorted.

datetime_starvation.description: Date and time at which the flies were moved to starvation material.

seconds_shiftflytemp.description: Time in seconds between bringing the fly vials into the hot room and experiment start.

seconds_fliesloaded.description: Time in seconds between loading the flies into the arena and experiment start.

temperature.description: Temperature snapshot at the time the assay was started.

humidity.description: Humidity snapshot at the time the assay was started.

content.description: An open field area for the experimenter to write observations about fly behavior from the start of the experiment.
An open field area for the experimenter to write observations about experimental equipment/conditions at the start of the experiment.

content.range_basic: None, Rearing problem, Flies look sick, See behavioral notes, See technical notes
content.range_advanced: None, Rearing problem, Flies look sick, See behavioral notes, See technical notes
content.description: Flag specifying whether or not experiment should be re-done and why.

content.range_basic: None, Rearing problem, Flies look sick, See behavioral notes, See technical notes
content.range_advanced: None, Rearing problem, Flies look sick, See behavioral notes, See technical notes
content.description: Flag specifying whether or not experiment should be re-done and why.
